question:
Which among the following pairs of Agricultural Revolution is/are correctly matched?
  1. Golden Fiber Revolution - Oil Seeds production
  2. Evergreen Revolution - Overall development of Agriculture
  3. Silver Fiber Revolution - Cotton production
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation:
Golden Fiber Revolution  - Jute Production
Green Revolution - Food grain Production
Yellow Revolution - Oil Seeds production
Evergreen Revolution  - Overall development of Agriculture
Silver Fiber Revolution  - Cotton production
